newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Aviron started at buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Aviron started at buy.

text.p: -- Robertson Stephens & Co said analyst Ed Hurwitz has started coverage of Aviron Inc with a buy rating.

-- In a statement Hurwitz said Aviron, a drug development company focused on next-generation vaccine development, is working on live vaccines to prevent influenza, parainfluenza, cytomegalovirus infections, herpes simplex virus and respiratory syncycial virus.

-- The company's lead product, Cold Adapted Influenza Virus Vaccine (CAIV), is now in a 1,600-patient Phase III study with results expected in the second half of 1998. Hurwitz said the vaccine has a history of safety and efficacy.
